alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Cleveland; Desha; Jefferson; Lincoln; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 02 at 11:30PM CST until January 02 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CST FOR EAST CENTRAL CLEVELAND...SOUTHEASTERN PRAIRIE...NORTHWESTERN DESHA...SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...LINCOLN AND WESTERN ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 1130 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Almyra to near Langford to near Douglas to near Cane Creek State Park, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stuttgart... Dumas... Star City... Gould... Gillett... Grady... Mitchellville... Almyra... Ulm... Whitefield... Little Bayou Meto Park... Woodville... Douglas... Herbine... Nebo... Feenyville... Linwood... Cane Creek State Park... Mills... Langford... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for eastern and southeastern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 300 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Arkansas; Cleveland; Desha; Jefferson; Lincoln; Prairie
